textBorderWidth.desc: Storke line width of the text.

textBorderType.desc:
Stroke line type of the text. Possible values are: 

* 'solid'
* 'dashed'
* 'dotted'

Since v5.0.0, it can also be a number or a number array to specify the [dash array][0] of the line. With textBorderDashOffset , we can make the line style more flexible. For exampleï¼š 

    {
    
    textBorderType: [5, 10],
    
    textBorderDashOffset: 5
    }
    



[0]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Attribute/stroke-dasharray

textBorderDashOffset.desc:
>  Since > v5.0.0 To set the line dash offset. With textBorderType , we can make the line style more flexible. Refer to MDN [lineDashOffset][0] for more details.

[0]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/lineDashOffset

textShadowColor.desc: Shadow color of the text itself.

textShadowBlur.desc: Shadow blue of the text itself.

textShadowOffsetX.desc: Shadow X offset of the text itself.

textShadowOffsetY.desc: Shadow Y offset of the text itself.

overflow.desc:
Determine how to display the text when it's overflow. Available when width is set. 

* 'truncate' Truncate the text and trailing with ellipsis.
* 'break' Break by word
* 'breakAll' Break by character.

ellipsis.desc: Ellipsis to be displayed when overflow is set to truncate.

lineOverflow.desc:
Determine how to display the text when it's overflow on height. 

* 'truncate' Truncate the overflow lines.
